projects.title: MentorLink
projects.description: MentorLink is a comprehensive web-based platform designed to streamline the mentorship process in educational institutions. It facilitates automated mentor-mentee matching, meeting management, progress tracking, and provides powerful administrative tools for program coordinators.
features: Role-based authentication for admins, mentors, and mentees
Secure data handling with JWT authentication

projects.title: MailMan - Email Management System
projects.description: A comprehensive email management system built with Next.js 14, featuring secure authentication, email verification, and advanced user management. The application demonstrates modern web development practices with server-side rendering, responsive design, and robust security features.
features: Secure credential-based authentication with email verification
Dark/Light theme support with smooth transitions
User profile management with customizable settings
Email service integration with customizable templates
Responsive design with modern UI/UX principles
Custom error handling and logging system

projects.title: Faculty Subject Selector (FSS)
projects.description: A comprehensive web application for managing faculty subject selection in educational institutions. Features include secure authentication, role-based access control, automated course allocation, and real-time tracking of form submissions.
features: Role-based authentication for Admin and Faculty users
Real-time form submission tracking and status updates
Dynamic course allocation with load optimization
Automated PDF generation for form submissions
Intuitive subject selection interface for faculty
Protected API routes with middleware authentication

projects.title: EventHorizon
projects.description: A sophisticated event management platform built with Next.js 14 and Material-UI. Features comprehensive event handling, calendar visualization, and real-time notifications. Implements secure user authentication, database management with Prisma, and containerized deployment with Docker.
features: Comprehensive event CRUD operations with calendar visualization
Secure authentication and user profile management
Advanced notification system with email integration
Protected API routes with rate limiting
Type-safe database queries and API endpoints
Responsive calendar interface with filtering capabilities

projects.title: AIDOC: Medical Knowledge Base
projects.description: A medical RAG knowledge base using Pinecone, Next.js, and LangChain. Features real-time data updates and efficient document processing with Transformers.js.

projects.title: CROPIN: A Web App
projects.description: A full-stack Next.js app connecting farmers with buyers. Features secure authentication with NextAuth.js, MongoDB integration, and comprehensive schema validation using ZOD.
